string.text: Anarchists of the Zone. Professes the idea that 'It's nature that reserves liberty'. It is believed that all laws, rules and conventions of the external world are no longer valid. Their motto: 'Do what you want, but do not disturb others'. Mainly fight against government attempts to take control of the Zone, and fight mercenaries when necessary. Equipped with mostly small arms from the former Soviet Union and Russia.

Adventurers and thugs from around the world. They do not abhor to any philosophy. Even dirty work is ok. Their motto: 'Money does not smell'. Here the artifacts smell like money. Mercenaries are equipped with mainly western small arms.
